item.title: Setting up your container server - Part 1
item.description: Today, it is quite possible to consume the internet passively and get just about any service you want without a tinker. A blog on blogger.com, a cheap website at ovh, a cloud service on google drive and even your own web applications. But if you’re like me and like to host everything by yourself, I’ll show you, step by step and in a detailed way, how to set up your own multi-function swiss army knife server in a few steps.
